3 Seeders in the swarm now, I'm at 54.4% 13.5 hrs after initial seeding.

I copied the first MP3 to my desktop and listened to it, fragmented as it still yet is.  This IS the real deal.  I've heard bits from the Foreword up to Chapter 8.  I actually heard the narrator say "Chapter 8", so this is new material.

Download and enjoy.  :)
